title: Kathleen B. Cooper CU in D.C. Endowed Scholarship Fund
description: To provide scholarship support for students enrolled in the CU in D.C. Program who are Economics majors at The University of Colorado Boulder.  Recipients shall qualify for financial aid and maintain a GPA of 3.0 or higher.
marketingContent: To provide scholarship support for students enrolled in the CU in D.C. Program who are Economics majors at The University of Colorado Boulder. Recipients shall qualify for financial aid and maintain a GPA of 3.0 or higher.
